@toxaq The truck stop on Kaiwharawhara Road sells diesel for way cheaper than most stations in Wellington. Petrol is same price sadly

Diesel at Johnsonville: $1.39 p/litre.
Diesel at Kaiwharawhara: $0.95 p/litre.
Well worth the 10 minute drive to save $25 filling truck
Imagine being able to easily park in central Wellington city for 10 minutes… hardly a Carpark to be seen anymore
